text:
MongoDB is traditionally
an operational database

where companies can keep, store
all of their data in a secure
and scalable format.

What's really exciting
for us is we see a future

where generative AI is
permeating every sort

of digital experience that
someone will engage with.

We have tens of thousands of
customers that leverage AWS
and MongoDB together,

and so we recognize that
it's critical for all of them

that we create a seamless
experience between all

of the offerings that are
available on Bedrock, such
as large language models,
and make them accessible via MongoDB.

And we also recognize
that with our customers,

what's critical to them
is scalability, security,

and so you can access the
Amazon Bedrock integration

with Private Link to ensure
that you have the maximum
security with your data.

We've obtained the Generative
AI Competency from AWS
and it means so much to us.

We are very confident in our
ability to enable customers
to build GenAI applications on MongoDB

with AWS. As I've shared,
we see that across thousands

of customers ranging
from early stage startups
to the largest enterprises in the world.

And so that accreditation
means a lot to us

and we look forward
to building off of it.
